name: CRMAuditReportGenerator
description: Generates detailed reports on components within a Dynamics 365 instance.
author: capgemini-uk

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: ConnectionString to Dynamics 365 instance. [Microsoft Connection String Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect#create-a-connection-string)

inputs.name: outputDir
inputs.label: OutputDir
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output directory where the reports will be created.

inputs.name: reportName
inputs.label: Report Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the generated report.

inputs.name: reportsToRecipients
inputs.label: Recipient Email List
inputs.helpMarkDown: The list of recipient email addresses that the generated reports will be sent to.

inputs.name: sendGridKey
inputs.label: SendGrid Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The key for the SendGrid email account that will be used to send the reports.

inputs.name: generateJsonReport
inputs.label: Generate JSON Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if a JSON version of the report should be created.

inputs.name: generateXmlReport
inputs.label: Generate XML Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if an XML version of the report should be created.

inputs.name: generateExcelReport
inputs.label: Generate Excel Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if a Microsoft Excel version of the report should be created.

inputs.name: requiredPublishers
inputs.label: Publishers Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the semi-colon separated list of publishers whose Dynamics 365 solutions should be included in the audit. E.g. Microsoft;Capgemini
